InstructionData.Title: Advanced Furnace Safety
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias tank d0 alias valve d1 alias pump d2
alias tankTemp r0 alias tankPress r1
define SOFTLIMIT 10000 define HARDLIMIT 15000 define ON 1 define OFF 0
main: jal checkSensors bge tankPress HARDLIMIT releasePressure bge tankPress SOFTLIMIT pumpTank s pump On OFF s valve On OFF j main
checkSensors: l tankTemp tank Temperature l tankPress tank Pressure j ra
pumpTank: s pump On ON j main
releasePressure: s valve On ON j main
